resources.string:
Last Updated: January 2024
1. Acceptance of Terms By creating an account on UniCourseLC, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.
2. User Account You must provide accurate information when creating an account.
3. Data Collection and Privacy We collect and process your personal data in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
4. Use of Service You agree to use UniCourseLC for lawful purposes only.
5. Intellectual Property All content is for personal, non-commercial use only.
6. Limitation of Liability UniCourseLC provides university information for reference purposes only.
7. Account Termination We reserve the right to suspend accounts that violate these terms.
Contact: support@unicourselc.com
